org.jacp.api.workbench

Interface IWorkbench<C,L,A,M>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - defines the base component where others extend from
    L - defines the action listener type
    A - defines the basic action type
    M - defines the basic message type
    All Superinterfaces:
    IBase<L,A,M>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AFXWorkbench

    public interface IWorkbench<C,L,A,M>
extends IBase<L,A,M>
    Base component for an JACP UI application, handles perspectives and containing components. A workbench is the root of all JACP perspectives an component. You can have 1 workbench including (1-n) perspectives which can include (1-n) components.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek

    • Method Summary
